text: @realDonaldTrump Yeah the cowardly Wisconsin Supreme Court stayed home in the comfort and protection of their homes to force people out to get sick and die instead of in person deliberations. The dudes win was red Wisconsin. Open those bars without protection watch the numbers of COVID19 rise.
